titlecard.heading: Why We Love You Yera
titlecard.from: Aileen Jackie Karen Lori Mo Tara

card.note: Because you always ask me to order you a "chicken parm" or as Jon says, "chicken nuggets."
card.author: Lori

card.note: Because 25 years later I can still call you my best friend.
card.author: Karen

card.note: Because you love lists so hopefully you can see why we love you.
card.author: Aileen

card.note: Because I can call you any time of day or night and you are always there for me when I need you.
card.author: Tara

card.note: Because you have made us all love and crave Indian food.
card.author: Jackie

card.note: Because you have an undeniably contagious laugh and vivacious personality. Just being around you lifts my spirit.
card.author: Maureen

card.note: Because you send cards and thank you's to our parents and they absolutely love you!
card.author: Lori

card.note: Because we are truly "cut from the same cloth."
card.author: Karen

card.note: Because despite the fact you have eaten in some of the world's best restaurants your favorite foods are still Munchos and a turkey sandwich (and ketchup - I don't believe you have given it up.)
card.author: Aileen

card.note: Because you have the ability to remember such specific details and instantly bring me back to a moment in time we shared 20 years ago and make me laugh about it.
card.author: Tara

card.note: Because you have the ability to organize anything...even my keychain.
card.author: Jackie

card.note: Because of the selfless way you share your tremendous gifts (kindness, generosity, thoughtfulness, to name just a few) with everyone you come in contact with...even if it's a friend of a friend. Thank you.
card.author: Maureen

card.note: Because my children get so excited to hear that you are coming for a visit.
card.author: Lori

card.note: Because even though you are so worldly and sophisticated you are still that girl from Chalfont who loved Arsenio Hall.
card.author: Karen

card.note: Because you have taken the time to know everything about me, my husband, my kids, my parents, and my siblings - that is why you are my family's "favorite friend."
card.author: Aileen

card.note: Because you have an incredible sense of loyalty and love for your friends and their families.
card.author: Tara

card.note: Because you accept me for who I am and still love me.
card.author: Jackie

card.note: Because you have the ability to truly listen and validate my feelings, no mater what, and never judge.
card.author: Maureen

card.note: Because I love being your "therapist" and it helps me too!
card.author: Lori

card.note: Because no matter how much time has passed we can pick up right where we left off.
card.author: Karen

card.note: Because if it is important to me it is important to you.
card.author: Aileen

card.note: Because you are truly a sister to me and an aunt to my kids.
card.author: Tara

card.note: Because your kindness and generosity has no limits.
card.author: Jackie

card.note: Because your friendship is something I can count on and look forward to each and every time we get together - any time, anywhere!
card.author: Maureen

card.note: Because I love hearing "where in the world is Yera Patel."
card.author: Lori

card.note: Because you never judge me. You only love and support me unconditionally.
card.author: Karen

card.note: Because no matter how sophisticated you have become you'll still dance to Cotton Eyed Joe.
card.author: Aileen

card.note: Because we can spend hours talking about the silliest things and can always pick up right where we left off.
card.author: Tara

card.note: Because you have taught me how to thread my eyebrows, bleach my arm hair and pluck my grey hairs.
card.author: Jackie

card.note: Because you have taught me that just letting someone know you are thinking of them can make a world of difference.
card.author: Maureen

card.note: Because you are my best friend, confidant, and "Brown" sister.
card.author: Lori

card.note: Because we can still giggle together like school girls...even at age 40!
card.author: Karen

card.note: Because you have a way of describing things that makes even the most mundane things seem magical.
card.author: Aileen

card.note: Because you are a great travel companion and we have traveled to some amazing places together.
card.author: Tara

card.note: Because you have the ability to take charge and lead.
card.author: Jackie

card.note: Because of your fierce loyalty when it comes to family and friends. That's what life is about!
card.author: Maureen

card.note: Because you have no idea how special you are to all of us!
card.author: Lori

card.note: Because your memory is like a vault. You put me to shame with details and stories you can recall!
card.author: Karen

card.note: Because I love seeing the world through your eyes, you capture the essence of a place and help me see things differently than I normally would.
card.author: Tara

card.note: Because you taught me how to "kill people with kindness" - it's one of the smartest lessons I've learned in my life and hope to pass on to my children.
card.author: Jackie

card.note: Because you get it done, while the rest of us are still trying to figure out how.
card.author: Maureen

card.note: Because you have an incredible impact on every life you touch.
card.author: Karen

card.note: Because you are simply amazing and beautiful on the inside and out.
card.author: Tara

card.note: Because you care for and love my family and they love being with you as much as I do - it warms my heart and is why you are one of my dearest friends.
card.author: Maureen
